title: Marked
description: Librarian notes: this is an alternate cover edition ASIN: B008C62JEY.When the man of her dreams walks into Kateâ€™s reality. She hopes that this will mark the beginning of a chance to truly live her life, free from abuse and torment. She doesn't know that there are more sinister forces at work, powers that will threaten to tear her apart.Centuries old curses, demons, voodoo priestesses, a guardian angel, and an array of intriguing humans and vampires make up the backdrop of this love story. A blood curse placed on Kate in a past life threatens to tear her away from her new found sanctuary. She has to adjust to her new life, learn the details from her past that can help her, and break the curse before the demon claims her as his own. She uses the council of a captivating group of friends, and ancient Egyptian and religious texts to help her along her journey.
author: A.N. Meade
